rev.desc.rev.desc: update panel set.ess.license, add condition for Service Catalog ESS
update panel set.ess.license, add Service Catalog for ESS
AGMRQ10H3367, Code changes to make the running PD/non-PD request in parallel possible
If the user has only View right for SLM, it will comsume one SLM license
Regarding update action of SLM, update the check condition
Add idol module license and report it into stathistory table
Service Manager License Usage is incorrect for ESS user. changes to NOT consume any Module Licenses when ESS user login.
The stathistory results for "SLA" and "Self Service" are incorrect
never go through the branch of sla stat. when contract profile is not empty. go to incident stat directly skip to sla stat
Panel 'set.contract.capabilities'
Exists:normal changed from check.incident.environment to check.sla.environment
Hua: remove part that checks for change management license when setup km since km is no longer depend on change module
When writing stathistory records, send the new names Configuration Management & Problem Management instead of the old names: Inventory Management & Root Cause
Changes to support licesne to DB project. No longer call set.module.license() multiple times if the RTE can accept all the values in an array. Also make code backward compatibile.
Changes to support licesne to DB project. No longer call set.module.license() multiple times if the RTE can accept all the values in an array. Also make code backward compatibile.

QC54122 - The RAD applications se.search.engine and se.view.engine do not consider that the PM module can have different access configuration for problems, problem tasks, known errors and known error tasks.
Panel: set.rootcause.capabilities
Changed references to pmt.open from pmt.open to pmt.new
Changed references to kne.open from kne.open to kne.new
Added the following lines:
if (ket.new in $G.rc.environment~=false and not null(ket.new in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (ket.update in $G.rc.environment~="never" and not null(ket.update in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (ket.close in $G.rc.environment~=false and not null(ket.close in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (ket.reopen in $G.rc.environment~=false and not null(ket.reopen in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (exists("tableAccessKETask", $G.rc.environment) and not null($G.rc.environment)) then ($L.folders=denull(folders in tableAccessKETask in $G.rc.environment))

if (nullsub($G.folderEntitlement, false) and lng($L.folders)>0) then for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.folders) do (if (2 in $L.i in $L.folders or 4 in $L.i in $L.folders or 5 in $L.i in $L.folders~="never") then ($L.update.capability=true))
exit panel on the set.sm.capabilities panel of set.module.licensing to check.km.envrionment instead of set.km.update.capabilities

updated the application to not search for specific elements in the array. The application now indexes through the structured array returned by the get.module.license() function and finds the specific text for the module in question. It then determines the index for this and uses that to set the named and floating license values.
Broke the code to set module licensing for sm and km module into subroutines to reduce the size of the code record below 32700 bytes.
updated the search into the named.modules array to reference 'Configuration Management' instead of 'Asset Management' and 'Problem Management' instead of 'Root Cause'
Panel set.sla.capabilities
Changed queries from:
$L.query.named="month="+$L.month+" and day="+$L.day+" and year="+$L.year+" and name=\"SLA - Named\""
$L.query.floating="month="+$L.month+" and day="+$L.day+" and year="+$L.year+" and name=\"SLA - Floating\""
to
$L.query.named="month="+$L.month+" and day="+$L.day+" and year="+$L.year+" and name=\"SLA Management - Named\""
$L.query.floating="month="+$L.month+" and day="+$L.day+" and year="+$L.year+" and name=\"SLA Management - Floating\""
added code to recognize folders in Change Management environment
added code to recognize folders in Config Mgmt environment.
Added code to recognize folders in PM environment
Added code to recognize folders in IM environment
Added code to recognize folders in SD environment.
fixed check.sm.environment panel
Added knowledge management module license tracking code for stathistory and nameduser
Renamed "Service Management" to "Service Desk". on set.sm.capabilities panel.
Modified module name for ESS license check to the proper "Self Service Ticketing".
Recompile only.
Added processing for the SLA application.
Added license logging for ESS users to stathistory file
changed the following expressions on the following panels from:
$L.named.count=2 in 8 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 8 in $L.license.array
panel: set.sm.capabilities
to:
$L.floating.count=3 in 11 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 11 in $L.license.array
panel: set.rootcause.capabilities
to:
$L.named.count=2 in 16 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 16 in $L.license.array
panel: set.rm.license
to:
$L.named.count=2 in 9 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 9 in $L.license.array
panel: set.inventory.capabilities
to:
$L.named.count=2 in 7 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 7 in $L.license.array
panel: set.incident.capabilities
to:
$L.named.count=2 in 6 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 6 in $L.license.array
panel: set.contract.capabilities
to:
$L.named.count=2 in 18 in $L.license.array
$L.floating.count=3 in 18 in $L.license.array
devtx BUG13903
added a check for each environment variable. If the environment variable is NULL for any reason then the application will not try to setup the module licensing for that particular module.

descript.descript: update panel set.ess.license, add condition for Service Catalog ESS
update panel set.ess.license, add Service Catalog for ESS
AGMRQ10H3367, Code changes to make the running PD/non-PD request in parallel possible
If the user has only View right for SLM, it will comsume one SLM license
Regarding update action of SLM, update the check condition
Add idol module license and report it into stathistory table
Service Manager License Usage is incorrect for ESS user. changes to NOT consume any Module Licenses when ESS user login.
The stathistory results for "SLA" and "Self Service" are incorrect
never go through the branch of sla stat. when contract profile is not empty. go to incident stat directly skip to sla stat
Panel 'set.contract.capabilities'
Exists:normal changed from check.incident.environment to check.sla.environment
Hua: remove part that checks for change management license when setup km since km is no longer depend on change module
When writing stathistory records, send the new names Configuration Management & Problem Management instead of the old names: Inventory Management & Root Cause
Changes to support licesne to DB project. No longer call set.module.license() multiple times if the RTE can accept all the values in an array. Also make code backward compatibile.
Changes to support licesne to DB project. No longer call set.module.license() multiple times if the RTE can accept all the values in an array. Also make code backward compatibile.

QC54122 - The RAD applications se.search.engine and se.view.engine do not consider that the PM module can have different access configuration for problems, problem tasks, known errors and known error tasks.
Panel: set.rootcause.capabilities
Changed references to pmt.open from pmt.open to pmt.new
Changed references to kne.open from kne.open to kne.new
Added the following lines:
if (ket.new in $G.rc.environment~=false and not null(ket.new in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (ket.update in $G.rc.environment~="never" and not null(ket.update in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (ket.close in $G.rc.environment~=false and not null(ket.close in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (ket.reopen in $G.rc.environment~=false and not null(ket.reopen in $G.rc.environment)) then ($L.update.capability=true)
if (exists("tableAccessKETask", $G.rc.environment) and not null($G.rc.environment)) then ($L.folders=denull(folders in tableAccessKETask in $G.rc.environment))

if (nullsub($G.folderEntitlement, false) and lng($L.folders)>0) then for $L.i = 1 to lng($L.folders) do (if (2 in $L.i in $L.folders or 4 in $L.i in $L.folders or 5 in $L.i in $L.folders~="never") then ($L.update.capability=true))
